Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: All skate trails have been groomed at Huron Meadows. There's quite a bit of stumble showing though on the north and south golf course areas, but Buck's Run, the wooded trail behind Buck's Run, and the "contractor's loop" (Cedar Trace Trail) had good snow coverage. No classic track has been set - there's not enough snow. The snow is still soft - it should form up over the next few days. Better than expected early season conditions...and a snow gun is starting to build up a pile of man-made snow!

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Nubs Nob is not yet open for its down hill program : coming this weekend . But the groomers jumped the gun on the Nordic Trails . Access through Valley road to the red and blue loops are currently primo !

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are being packed today. Not open for skiing as we prepare trails.
nubsNob.comments: Nub's Nob is closed today as we focus on snowmaking. We will be open for skiing and riding December 6 and 7 from 9 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. for our first two days of the ski season. Last night and this morning over 8" of natural snow landed at Nub's Nob and it's still coming down. We are excited to welcome you all back to the slopes on December 6 and 7. We plan to reopen the slopes on December 12 and remain open everyday of the week.
